channel.title: Trying to add Donator point errors!

item.title: Trying to add Donator point errors!
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[code=java]Code: public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) {

     }if (c.myShopId == ##) {
        if (c.DonorPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); 
           if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
              c.DonorPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
              c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
              c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
           }
        } else {
           c.sendMessage("You do not have enough Donator Points to buy this item.");         
        }
     }[/code]

Try this

item.title: Trying to add Donator point errors!
item.dc:creator: @Deadly-Pkerz Deadly-Pkerz
item.description:
@Deadly-Pkerz wrote:

Ok so i was following this guide, http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/378312-pi-how-make-donator-shop-pi.html

And im on the last steps but im stuck can someone help me?

Im on step

Code: public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) {

Then under that add: }
if (c.myShopId == ##) {
if (c.DonorPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.DonorPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough Donator Points to buy this item.”);
}

But when i add this under is i get these errors.
